Highlights in Jazz #18: Big Band Sounds for the Seventies - Bill Watrous and the Manhattan Wildlife Refuge, Dr. Lyn Christie (Tape 1 of 3)
Highlights in Jazz #18: Big Band Sounds for the Seventies - Bill Watrous and the Manhattan Wildlife Refuge, Dr. Lyn Christie (Tape 1 of 3)

Original format: 1/2 inch open reel video; Tranfer Technician Notes: "As with other tapes in this collection, there is an inherent constant sync error that is stabilized by time base correction, but ultimately results in moderate to severe flagging throughout. This flagging is generally above the performers, but intensifies in low lighting. Mild image jitter throughout. Elsewhere, there are occasional mild dropouts and tape damage. Occasional inherent exposure adjustments and mild ghosting. Luma is adjusted to mitigate clipping from glare. Mild audio distortion and buzz is inherent to the original recording."
